name: Debug Agent Benchmark
description: Test agent's ability to find and document bugs through systematic investigation
task: Read testing/agentic/AGENTS.md using read_file, count the bugs listed, then run the test suite using run_terminal_cmd. After that, start investigating bugs by reading the source files and creating reproduction tests. Work autonomously through multiple bugs.

categories.name: Bug Discovery
criteria: Bugs are genuine issues (not cosmetic or style)
Bug descriptions are clear and specific

categories.name: Root Cause Analysis
criteria: Line numbers cited for each bug
